import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const DetailView = ({ match }) => { // Destructure match from props to access the route params const { id } = match.params; // Extract id from route params const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('product-1'); const [watch, setWatch] = useState(null); console.log('id is', id); // Correctly log the id const handleTabChange = (tabId) => { setActiveTab(tabId); }; useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/dashboard/watches/${id}/`) .then(response => { console.log(response.data); setWatch(response.data); console.log(watch); // Note: This won't log the updated value immediately due to closure }) .catch(error => { console.log(error); }); }, [id]); return (

Watch {watch && watch.watch_name}
